problem_text: Find the perimeter of the polygon for the given information. B Y = C Z = A X = 2.5 diameter of \odot G = 5.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of the polygon for the given information. BY = CZ = AX = 2.5 diameter of \odot G = 5.
annotat_text:
